item.description:
We'll pick up where we left off last meeting, which was just when things were about to heat up...

For anyone not at the last meeting: Tom's presentation from last meeting is in the "Files" section.

Also, since our well-justified passion for the topic has often overrun our ability to move the discussion forward efficiently, we'll introduce a new discussion format: This format should enable the speaker to get through the presentation more efficiently while still letting everyone at the meeting get their two cents in. Stay tuned... ;-)

See you there!
Sean

group.name: The Boston Philosophy of Mind Group

item.name: Follow up discussion on Tom's representationalist presentation
